metadata.title: Add Watermark to Images | Batch Shots
metadata.description: Add custom text or logo watermarks to your images easily. Protect your photos with watermarks with control over opacity, position, and size.
metadata.keywords: watermark, add watermark to images, photo watermark, watermark image, logo watermark, text watermark, image branding, watermark photos
